items.title: Location
items.content: Mutsumi Building 3F, 2-10-48 Kitakochi, Nishi-ku, Yokohama, Kanagawa, 220-0004, Japan

message.title: Message from the CEO
message.body:
Through IT, we aim to share the charm of Japan with the world.
In particular, I truly love traditional Japanese sweets, and I believe they have the potential to be enjoyed by many more people.
By using digital technology, we will deliver this culture across borders and create a future where more people can savor it.
